p: PeV-A infection also shows a clear seasonality with a majority of infections recorded in late summer and fall [ 53, 54, 55]. Interestingly, PeV-A3, in contrast to the other genotypes, has been reported to circulate biannually in the Netherlands and Scotland [ 41, 56]. Ultimately, epidemiological studies reporting PeV-A prevalence vary greatly between cohorts in age, clinical presentation, and sample types collected, hampering direct comparisons. Increases in sequencing efforts and standardization of diagnostic PeV-A testing will lead to improved insights on both PeV-A epidemiology and diversity.
